typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		sr_no as integer,
		employee_first_name as string,
		employee_last_name as string,
		age as integer,
		school as string,
		college as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 filter(sr_no > 0) ~> Filter1
source1, DerivedColumn1 lookup(source1@employee_first_name == employee_l_name,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	asc(source1@employee_first_name, true),
	broadcast: 'none')~> Lookup
source1 derive(no = sr_no,
		employee_l_name = employee_last_name,
		ages = age,
		employee_f_name = employee_first_name,
		schools = school,
		colleges = college) ~> DerivedColumn1
